ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaMainCustomerNameMustNotBeEmpty
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter the name of customer.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the name of customer is not empty.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaMainCustomerEmailInvalid
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please provide a valid email for the customer.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the email of customer is valid.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaMainContactPartnerLastNameEmpty
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please specify the last name for the contact partner.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the lastname of contactpartner is not empty.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaMainContactPartnerEmailInvalid
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please provide a valid email for the contact partner.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates if the email of contactpartner is valid.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaMainOpeningTimeFromGreaterTimeThru
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Time from of opening time must be earlier than Time Thru.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates that time from of opening time cannot be greater than time thru.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaPosValidFromGreaterValidThru
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Valid From must be earlier or same as Valid Thru.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates that valid from of opening time cannot be greater than valid thru.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaPOSNameMustNotBeEmpty
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter the name of POS #posId#, #text#.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates that the name of pos is not empty.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaPOSValidityPeriodMustNotOverlap
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The validity period of POS #posId#, #text# must not overlap.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates that the name of pos is not empty.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaPOSNoDeletionAllowedMsg
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: POS relation is mandatory. You cannot delete mandatory POS relations.
ValidationMessage.comment: Validates that no mandatory POS relations will be deleted.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaPOSConfirmDeletionMsg
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to delete POS relation?
ValidationMessage.comment: Confirmation message for POS relation deletion

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaLocationCouldNotBeUpdated
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Sorry, could not update the location.
ValidationMessage.comment: Notification after failed manual location update

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaSplittingRuleHasToBeFilled
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The splitting rule should not be blank.
ValidationMessage.comment: The splitting rule cannot be blank.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaSplittingRuleHasToBeBlank
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: The splitting rule should be blank.
ValidationMessage.comment: The splitting rule must be blank.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaMainOpeningTimeFromOrTimeThruNotEmpty
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please specify Time From and Time Thru for opening hours.
ValidationMessage.comment: Time from and Time thru of opening hours cannot be blank.

ValidationMessage.name: CasBpaPOSHasReferencedAsset
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Deleting this POS is not allowed because there are assets relying on it.
ValidationMessage.comment: A POS cannot be deleted if it has referenced assets.
